name: Cephlapods In Space
description:
An entry to the 7 Day Broughlike game jam. I learnt a lot making it and hope you enjoy it!

Controls

Use arrow keys to move.

How To Play

Aim to score as many points as you can by eliminating enemies (or causing them to eliminate each other). Points are awarded as follows:

- 10 points every time you hit an enemy

- 100 points every time the squid is eleminated

- 175 points every time the octopus is elimated

- 250 points every time the nautilus is eliminated

- double points are awarded for an elimination if you land the final blow yourself (rather than letting an enemy do it)
